SEARCH
Package Deck_Of_Cards

Class Deck

java.lang.Object
Deck_Of_Cards.Deck
public class Deck extends Object
The deck class contains all the functions that would add or remove cards, along with modifying the number or order of the cards inside the deck.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Deck()
    Constructor for the Deck Class creates a variable called deck, which is set to an empty ArrayList which will contain card objects in the future.
    Deck(boolean makeDeck)
    Constructor for the Deck Class, with an additional parameter that checks if 52 cards are to be added to the created deck ArrayList.

  • Constructor Details

    • Deck

      public Deck()
      Constructor for the Deck Class creates a variable called deck, which is set to an empty ArrayList which will contain card objects in the future. This constructor is used for the discarded deck in Game.class, to allow for the storage of discarded cards, which are used to recreate the deck when the deck gets low on cards

    • Deck

      public Deck(boolean makeDeck)
      Constructor for the Deck Class, with an additional parameter that checks if 52 cards are to be added to the created deck ArrayList. The deck is created via two for loops, The outer for loop iterates a number of times equal to the number of suits inside the Suits.java file (4) The Inner for loop iterates a number of times equal to the number of Ranks inside the Rank.java file (13) The end result is 52 cards, 4 of each suit with each suit having 13 different ranks
      Parameters:
      makeDeck - , True or False to determine if the deck should be filled with cards or not

  • Method Details

    • addCard

      public void addCard(Card card)
      Method to add individual cards to the deck, not used for the blackjack game
      Parameters:
      card - an Card Object to be added to the deck

    • takeCard

      public Card takeCard()
      Method to make a card object that is a copy of the top card of the deck, then removes the top card of the deck Before finally returning the copied card to wherever called takeCard()
      Returns:
      card

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Method to turn the entire contents of the deck object as a string, each card printed on a new line and return that string to the function that called it.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      output

    • shuffle

      public void shuffle()
      Method to shuffle the deck of cards. This is done by creating a new empty ArrayList that will contain cards called shuffled. Then while deck still has cards in it. Perform the Following steps 1. Generate a random integer between 0 and the number of cards left in deck - 1 2. Add the card at that index in deck to shuffled 3. Remove the card at that index in deck from deck. After the while loop evaluates to false, set deck to be equal to shuffled.

    • hasCards

      public boolean hasCards()
      Method to check if the deck has any cards left in it, returns true if it has more than 0 cards left in it. returns false if it has 0 or less cards left in it.
      Returns:
      true or false

    • emptyDeck

      public void emptyDeck()
      Method to completely remove all cards from the deck

    • addCards

      public void addCards(ArrayList<Card> cards)
      Method to take an argument of an arrayList and then appending them to the current Deck of cards
      Parameters:
      cards - An ArrayList of card objects, which for this program will be another deck of cards.

    • getCards

      public ArrayList<Card> getCards()
      Returns the Contents of this deck
      Returns:
      The contents of this deck object

    • reloadDeckFromDiscard

      public void reloadDeckFromDiscard(Deck discard)
      Method to take a deck (In this case the discarded deck) , add those cards to the current deck.and then shuffle The current deck is then shuffled, the old discarded deck is emptied. Then a message telling the user that the deck has been reshuffled and reset
      Parameters:
      discard - which is the discarded deck from game.java

    • cardsLeft

      public int cardsLeft()
      Method to get the number of cards left in the deck.
      Returns:
      deck.size()
